title.rendered: India’s squad for the ODI series and the final two tests of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy have been revealed

content.rendered:
The All-India Senior Selection Committee has chosen India’s squad for the third and fourth Test matches, the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, the three-match ODI series, and the present Mastercard Australia Tour of India.

The following players will represent India in the third and fourth Tests against Australia:

Rohit Sharma (Captain), K L Rahul, Shubman Gill, Cheteshwar Pujara, Virat Kohli, KS Bharat (wk), Ishan Kishan (wk), Ravichandran Ashwin, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Ravindra Jadeja, Mohd. Shami, Mohd. Siraj, Shreyas Iyer, Suryakumar Yadav, Umesh Yadav, Jaydev Unadkat.

(Read Also: Gujarat Titans face Chennai Super Kings in the IPL 2023 opener on 31st March)

The following players will represent India in the one-day international match against Australia:

Rohit Sharma (captain), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Suryakumar Yadav, K L Rahul, Ishan Kishan (wk), Hardik Pandya (vice-captain), Ravindra Jadeja, Kuldeep Yadav, Washington Sundar, Yuzvendra Chahal, Mohd. Shami.

Note: Due to family obligations, Mr. Rohit Sharma will be unable to play in the first ODI. Instead, Mr. Hardik Pandya will captain the team.
